SEARCH:
模块 com.example.demo
程序包 com.example.demo.Level.LevelManager

类 CollisionManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.Level.LevelManager.CollisionManager
public class CollisionManager extends Object
Manages the collision detection and handling for various actors in the game. This includes collisions between projectiles, enemy units, the user plane, and collectible items. The class provides methods for detecting and handling collisions between different entities such as projectiles, enemy units, and the user plane, and also manages the consequences of these collisions (e.g., taking damage, upgrading projectiles, or picking up items).

  • 构造器详细资料

    • CollisionManager

      public CollisionManager()

  • 方法详细资料

    • handleCollisions

      public static void handleCollisions(List<ActiveActorDestructible> actors1, List<ActiveActorDestructible> actors2)
      Handles collisions between two lists of actors, applying damage to both colliding actors. If two actors collide, both will take damage.
      参数:
      actors1 - the first list of actors to check for collisions
      actors2 - the second list of actors to check for collisions

    • handleUserProjectileCollisions

      public static void handleUserProjectileCollisions(List<ActiveActorDestructible> userProjectiles, List<ActiveActorDestructible> enemyUnits)
      Handles collisions between user projectiles and enemy units. This method calls the handleCollisions method with the user projectiles and enemy units lists. Both colliding projectiles and enemy units will take damage.
      参数:
      userProjectiles - the list of projectiles fired by the user
      enemyUnits - the list of enemy units

    • handleEnemyProjectileCollisions

      public static void handleEnemyProjectileCollisions(List<ActiveActorDestructible> enemyProjectiles, List<ActiveActorDestructible> friendlyUnits)
      Handles collisions between enemy projectiles and friendly units. This method calls the handleCollisions method with the enemy projectiles and friendly units lists. Both colliding projectiles and friendly units will take damage.
      参数:
      enemyProjectiles - the list of projectiles fired by enemies
      friendlyUnits - the list of friendly units

    • handleUserPlaneAndAmmoBoxCollisions

      public static void handleUserPlaneAndAmmoBoxCollisions(ActiveActorDestructible userPlane, List<ActiveActorDestructible> ammoBoxes)
      Handles collisions between the user plane and ammo boxes. If a collision is detected, it triggers an upgrade for the user's projectiles.
      参数:
      userPlane - the user's plane
      ammoBoxes - the list of ammo boxes

    • handleAmmoBoxPickup

      public static void handleAmmoBoxPickup(ActiveActorDestructible userPlane, ActiveActorDestructible ammoBox)
      Handles the pickup of an ammo box by the user plane, upgrading the user's projectiles.
      参数:
      userPlane - the user's plane
      ammoBox - the ammo box being picked up

    • handleUserPlaneAndHeartCollisions

      public static void handleUserPlaneAndHeartCollisions(ActiveActorDestructible userPlane, List<ActiveActorDestructible> hearts)
      Handles collisions between the user plane and heart items. If a collision is detected, it triggers an increase in the user's health.
      参数:
      userPlane - the user's plane
      hearts - the list of hearts

    • handleHeartPickup

      public static void handleHeartPickup(ActiveActorDestructible userPlane, ActiveActorDestructible heart)
      Handles the pickup of a heart item by the user plane, increasing the user's health.
      参数:
      userPlane - the user's plane
      heart - the heart being picked up

    • checkCollision

      private static boolean checkCollision(ActiveActorDestructible actor1, ActiveActorDestructible actor2)
      Checks if two actors are colliding by comparing their bounds in the parent scene. The collision is determined based on whether the bounding boxes of the two actors intersect.
      参数:
      actor1 - the first actor to check
      actor2 - the second actor to check
      返回:
      true if the actors are colliding, false otherwise
